subdisciplines.name: Bioinformatics
subdisciplines.description: The development and application of computational methods to analyze large biological datasets.

subdisciplines.name: Biomaterials
subdisciplines.description: The study of materials that can be used in medical devices, implants, and other applications in healthcare.

subdisciplines.name: Biomedical Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The application of engineering principles and design concepts to medicine and biology for healthcare purposes.
